Package org.opensextant.giscore.utils

Class SafeDateFormat

java.lang.Object
org.opensextant.giscore.utils.SafeDateFormat
@Deprecated public class SafeDateFormat extends Object
Deprecated.
(2.0.2) use SafeDateFormat.
SafeDateFormat is not a thread safe class and therefore needs to be instantiated on a per-thread basis. This class is a simplistic wrapper that wraps a per-thread formatter and creates them on the fly, exposing only needed functionality.
Author:
DRAND

    • SafeDateFormat

      public SafeDateFormat(String pattern)
      Deprecated.
      Constructs a SafeDateFormat using the given pattern and UTC (aka GMT) as the default time zone.
      Parameters:
      pattern - the pattern describing the date and time format
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if pattern is empty string or null

    • SafeDateFormat

      public SafeDateFormat(String pattern, TimeZone tz)
      Deprecated.
      Constructs a SafeDateFormat using the given pattern and TimeZone.
      Parameters:
      pattern - the pattern describing the date and time format
      tz - the given new time zone, if null UTC is used by default.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if pattern is empty string, blank or null
